1660020.name: BookGenie Any Book Downloader: PDF Search Engine for Web
1660020.description:
BookGenie Any Book Downloader: PDF Search Engine for Web


BookGenie Any Book Downloader (ABD) is a software to allow users to download ebooks or pdfs. Weather it be any fictional, educational books, scifi, e-learning content, comic etc.; BookGenie caters all sorts of pdf library content and reading material to its users. Essentially, BookGenie comprises of backend services wherein our servers keep search and indexing services for electronic and digital content, as our advance web crawler keep tracks of ebooks/pdfs available all across the web.

The aim of "BookGenie Any Book Downloader: PDF Search Engine for Web" is to make education cheap, accessible and free for all while keeping our servers continuously running to webcrawl all the educational content and keep its indexing. We Don't store or distribute any copyright material, we simply search & index its web address on the web. Aim is to make people learn first, upgrade themselves irrespective of there financial worries or family situation. We recommend, offer and support people to buy the respective books of authors (in either paperback or ebook format) they find value and are useful for them on "BookGenie Any Book Downloader" platform. Additionally, BookGenie ABD also make books and authors gain more readerbase among its userbase who ultimately will become there paid readers.
